com.amazon.inapp.purchasing

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazon.inapp.purchasing.Item

  • public final class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an in-app item, such as consumable content, entitled content or subscription content. You can retrieve item data by using PurchasingManager.initiateItemDataRequest(java.util.Set).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Item.ItemType
      Represents the type of an item such as consumable content, entitled content or subscription content.

    • Method Detail

      • getSku

        public java.lang.String getSku()
        Returns the item's stock-keeping unit (SKU). A SKU is a unique identifier for a purchasable item. It is unique to a developer account with the Amazon Appstore for Android, and is a (up to) 150-character length string of arbitrary structure that can contain the characters a-z, A-Z, 0-9, underscores, periods, and dashes, and is case-sensitive.
        Returns:
        The item's SKU

      • getItemType

        public Item.ItemType getItemType()
        Returns the item's type.
        Returns:
        The item's type

      • getPrice

        public java.lang.String getPrice()
        Returns the localized price of the item as a String. The price will include the currency symbol and be formatted appropriately based on the locale, i.e. in US $X.YZ and in France X,YZ€. Note that in the case of a subscription parent item, this value will be null.
        Returns:
        The item's price

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        Returns the localized title of the item. If the title doesn't exist for the locale it will default to english.
        Returns:
        The item's title

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns the localized description of the item. If the description doesn't exist for the locale it will default to english.
        Returns:
        The item's description

      • getSmallIconUrl

        public java.lang.String getSmallIconUrl()
        Returns the url of the small icon.
        Returns:
        The item's small icon URL

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
